Why do we associate certain music with certain scenes or events?
vsauce music starts playing
is it an extension of our primal insticts like when we associate screaming withhhh fear
Is this association of music and certain scenes our primal instincts coming back but repackaged as a new phenomena?
We never hear intense music playing in the background when we are being chased-
but it feels so natural when it's in a- show
or any other work of fiction
Is our mind's ability to associate certain sounds like screaming with scenes of terror responsible for this phenomena of associating music with scenes
Or is there more? Like a cultural aspect.
A song about ruining a relationship-
A Careless Whisper, it is now associated with scenes of romance and love
but it's only about ruining relationships
Why is that?

Until today I was a vsauce fan. However just right now I found his collab with howtobasic and I'm just disappointed in these double standards, which Michael seems to have. I can not comprehend, how someone who believes in science could support a person like that.
Teaching about science and with that about sustainability and so on, and then collaborating with one of the most childish and disgusting people there is just lets me lose trust.
And to the people saying, that HTB ist just using expired food:
1. What kind of message does he convey to others? Is that really reasonable. And yes, It does influence people to do that kind of things. Look for the content many people have on TikTok...
Think of people starving, beeing made fun of watching that kind of videos. Do the viewers and supporters have no empathy at all for people like that?
2. I'm pretty sure, that salt, sugar or dried noodles can't get bad and I highly doubt, that the amount of waste of one specific ingredient like that, would be in these extremes.
And all of the fresh food seems perfectly fine to me. I mean look at it?!
3. People acknowledging the food waste, but still thinking it is funny: Is it also okay to watch a video of people getting shot, however the shooting person is making jokes about it, so everything is ok now?!

If you want to, please try to convince me of the opposite opinion, because I did enjoy Michaels content very much. But with that in mind, I can't.
